lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First thing I want to announce, with a little help from our resident gnome bard here today: Scanlan's playlist on Spotify went up on the website. Do you want to talk a little bit about that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go log on to GeekandSundry.com, slash "find it on that site somewhere."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's on the front page right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you can find it on Spotify. There's some cool songs on there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's baby-making music right there, baby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. There's some panty peelers in there, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a terrible term.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go check that out, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go check that out, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. It's actually a pretty great playlist; I've been listening to it all afternoon while prepping for this. By the way, it's really interesting to write stuff for the current scenario in Whitestone with some Marvin Gaye in the background.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we going to feel that influence in tonight's game?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I certainly hope not. Also, next cool announcement: our first Critical Role comic came out today. Our four glorious first panels starting off the past adventure of the party in Westruun for their first Winter's Crest Festival. So yeah, there will be one four-panel comic coming out each week to go through the six week run of this storyline, written by our fantastic Taliesin Jaffe and Marisha Ray over here, and drawn by the incredible--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sam Riegel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. (laughs) @WendyDoodles on Twitter. You guys know her as Wendy. She's one of our official artists. She's absolutely amazing. She's our artist for this run. So show her some love.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Endlessly charming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, she is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very much so.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So anyone watching, don't fret. You still have a chance to win stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And what is in the giveaway?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Tons of shit. Signed posters, D&D stuff. It's just a box of awesome shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: www.TonsOfShit.com

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't look that up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't look that up. It's just going to make you unhappy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Obviously, we love Rat Queens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We like to fill your care packages with tons of cool shit. We throw random things in there for you guys, as well. Cool random things, not just random things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like Critical Role's favorite things.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll be putting out a catalog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Critical Role's most favorite things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, so check out the comic strip.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: There is a fucking broom behind you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's because we're going to sweep these Briarwoods under the carpet!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was quick. Love that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got another character ready to roll when this all goes down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! You can't have a plan B already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have a plan B.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Much like my parents, I have no plan B.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, if you want to take this away, we have some new merch, apparently, that just went up in the store.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my goodness gracious! So yeah, starting today, there will be a couple of Critmas hoodies available in the Geek and Sundry store, so Marisha, if you want to hold up one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ready?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's black and green. You guys should go on the website and check it out, because all the little details are freaking amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's ugly Critmas sweaters.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And these are designed by Kenneth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yule poop! There's yule poop here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw, there is, and it's singing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And there's a Pepperbox shooting bullets

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then there's arrows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And there's "dagger, dagger, dagger."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a Critmas sweater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just tweeted out links to the store from the @criticalrole twitter handle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they're the coolest, and then I know everybody was talking about how the "How Do You Want to Do This?" shirts were sold out. Those will be coming back very soon, and there is also "How Do You Want to Do This?" mouse pads for those people that don't want to wear anything and just want to surf the web.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Watch us, au naturel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm now wondering how much of our audience is currently-- no, never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just wearing a mouse pad? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For those who don't know, I don't wear pants during this show.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're like newscasters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's so hairy, we hardly notice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is escalating quickly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got plastic on my character.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, damn it. Oh man. Yeah, we had a lot of great feedback from people saying that shirts were great, but we want to expand into other parts of merchandise people were requesting, so we're starting to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there's some other cool things coming up, too, but that's what's available now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've been trying to be creative to make sure you guys have stuff if you want it, especially for this season.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and just to do it again since we haven't done it enough, please do check out the Spotify links and the comics. Go to the actual Geek and Sundry website because the more traffic the Geek and Sundry website gets for you guys going there to look at our stuff, the more excited they are to do cool stuff for us, so if you want more of this, definitely go there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, also if you go to the website, then you can see the blurbs that we wrote about each of the songs and the explanations about why we chose them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We each picked fanart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what I do. It's my news in the morning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a great idea. That's imitatable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have so much stuff we want to do for you guys. We have grand plans.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grand slam plans.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, ma'am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Denny's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, cool. Next up, just to remind you guys, most of our actual show announcements and stuff go up on our @criticalrole twitter handle, and we have all our personal ones, but that's our central place for all Critical Role-related business and announcements, so if you don't already follow that, you should because all our cool stuff goes up on that. Also, today's donations and our donations for a while are going to be going towards a new charity, pushing towards Doctors Without Borders, to help support people in crisis around the world. It's a wonderful organization. We're going to play a video with information about it during the break today, but in a world that is filled with a lot of positivity, there are dark places and there are dark things and people need aid, so we're hoping to do what we can to try and give to those circumstances, so check it out at the break and if anyone who is able to help give to that, please do so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Solid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see, a couple other announcements. We will be off next week for Thanksgiving because all of us have families to see, so there will be no Critical Role next week, unfortunately. I think we'll be doing-- are we doing a rebroadcast of something?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We'll probably do a rebroadcast of all the episodes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a marathon?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Sure, why not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A turkey I cooked, so undercooked. But yeah, so we won't be here next Thursday, but we'll be thinking of you lovingly in the process, and we'll be returning the Thursday after that to continue the story.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it never ends. No, I'll be eating copious amounts of pumpkin pie, probably.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: More, more! Yeah, so there's that. Other cool announcement, this week saw a video game release of Star Wars: Battlefront.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I haven't had a chance to play it yet, because Fallout.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Because Fallout.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both to kill you if you're rebels or to do better if you're with the Empire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the first time they're really focusing on female stormtroopers, so it's pretty cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else you want to go over?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now high five me while I high five down on the count of three. One.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, do I go up or down?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One, two, three (impact noise). Did it work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did it work?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got to go lower. One, two, three (impact noise).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! So strong! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to see if it works.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Switched over to PayPal. While he looks at that, one last thing. We are, as always, friends with Wyrmwood Gaming. If you want beautiful wooden boxes in all kinds of colors and patterns, go to Wyrmwood Gaming, and if you use the code CritRole, you will get free shipping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say it again. CritRole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'll get free shipping. Hey, one nerd helping out another.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They are so sexy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They are very sexy. And they have magnets in them to keep your dice protected when they're in your other bags. Your Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Christmas is just around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It keeps my Critmas bronze? Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, you've got your little mini.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know I'm so excited I have a mini! I'm not even in the game, really, but I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's Gilmore's mini. Any time Gilmore talks, can he have that mini?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. I'm going to one day do a Gilmore mini in private. It'll be fun. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's going to be my woobie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, now. Not cool. Not cool. We do not use the W word around here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he even know what he's saying?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, he knows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're off the rails again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking vampires.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you use woobie intentionally?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's in Mr. Mom!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They don't know where you're pointing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Point down!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's in Mr. Mom. This guy right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While they were searching this tunnel, it led to the dungeons, the prison cells beneath the Castle Whitestone where Percy once woke up five years before, before Cassandra helped him escape. While they were walking through those cells, they discovered an old woman currently locked down below there who is asking for the party's aid in freeing her from her imprisonment. And last time we left off, you were helping with--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fake helping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fake helping with the lock, much to her chagrin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and I had just snapped it off into the locks so that it's jammed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're a terrible person. All right, so as you snap off the lock and pull away from it, having the strange physical interaction in the darkness around here, Trinket behind you just breathing over your shoulder, keeping close to you just in case anything's wrong. She pulls her hands away. "Fine. (huff) Do as you wish, leave me to rot."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we'll be back. Don't worry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She backs up and sits in the far corner of the prison cell and (huffs).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look around. Has everyone left me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The only people that are in the light--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right then I follow to where everybody else is going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She only saw me and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Scanlan, yeah. You all stepped out into the light. The rest of you stayed in the shadows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so there are the rest of the cells which Vax has gone through and taken some time to inspect, where you found what appear to be the remnants of individuals who were imprisoned here and then left to die, long rotted, their corpses picked apart by various resident rodents and other creatures. After doing your passes, the conversation has happened, you see no other signs of life down here. This being the sole prisoner currently within the cells below.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go and I find Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, question.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When you cast Seeming on us, our visual-- if you made me look like a cow, would I seem like a cow when I bumped into you, or would I seem like a human?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you asking me to make you into a cow right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm saying that if something was different--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I think this is not the right time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that old woman was doing something weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do you think that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because she looked like she had full handses, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four hands?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Full.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, full hands. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Normal sort of hands, but I didn't feel them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You didn't feel them? You touched her hand and it just passed right through?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Her hand touched me, but it didn't--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's an illusion of some sort, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So she was doing some sort of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what, but yes. If I were to cast Seeming on us, or some other sort of magic, it would make us look one way but not feel that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess it's good that we left her, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a caster of some sort?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you dispel Seeming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we go find out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How would we do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you dispel Seeming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. (laughing) Let's go find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have a Dispel Magic on you right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have-- No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, I do!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I learned it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Keyleth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we calling everyone over for this conversation?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we should.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Away from her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm far away from her now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That prisoner over there is casting magic of some sort.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think she had Seeming cast on her. I don't know if she did it herself or if-- well, I don't think she was what she appeared to be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to waste power on somebody who's...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if she's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An early warning system?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, what if she's a guard?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if she's Lady Briarwood? Like what we were saying? That's what I'm most afraid of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then we should find out now and kill the shit out of her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I vote for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, before we do that, let's see who she is. I did come prepared, though, to dispel magic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you can do Dispel Magic?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I learned it. I did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stay in the shadows, Keyleth, and cast it on her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, you're wearing what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm wearing a hat of disguise so that I'm not immediately identifiable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you in disguise as?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A dude in a hat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Link from the Legend of Zelda. I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you've got to figure it out right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just as a reasonable Whitestone peasant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Terrible teeth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to blend in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By comparison to this troop, you're some poor sap who got pulled along, but yeah. You are that one quest-giver in Warcraft that walks way too slow and the party is like, "Come on, move!" That's who you look like right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before we dispel magic on her, should we have someone put her in their sights in case she gets a little funky monkey?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She will be able to feel it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah. She'll look like she's not herself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could also just ask her to drop it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We asked her who she was. She lied. A lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we could ask her to drop the Seeming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She lied pretty well, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could go talk to her, and meanwhile she could be fiddling with her magic behind me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You go talk to her. I'll be prepared.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll stay in the shadows with my arrow notched.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stay with Scanlan in case things go wrong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I stay next to Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I stay in the shadows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How close together are the bars to this cell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bars are about four inches apart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four inches.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So my arrow will do much better than your dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, no. I'm not saying for you not to, but would I be able to comfortably throw through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah? All right. I'm not telling you not to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She'd have a little bit of cover.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shoot your dagger?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't shoot daggers

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Passive-aggressive much?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so I stroll over back to the cell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With Scanlan, also.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, flanked by Grog. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not looking friendly, neither.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and there is the one torch that's a little off to the side that gives a little bit of light into this one portion of the dungeon below here. She's sat out, into the shadows of the far corner, arms crossed. You can see a little bit of the light framing her form. You make out okay in the darkness this close as a gnome, but you can see that she's just hunched in the corner, huffing in frustration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi. Old lady. Listen. We said we were going to come back for you and release you when all was said and done, but we cannot make that promise if you don't tell us the complete truth. Now, we know that you're using magic of some sort. Tell us who you really are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, what?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are smart little people. And big people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now, I have some familiarity with this, so I make no judgment as to why, but please reveal your true self to us or else we cannot trust you and we will leave you here to rot and possibly die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispered) Now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now! I do it now! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Now, I do it now?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hopefully quieter than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Keyleth, partially in the shadows-- the form of Scanlan small enough to not really obscure her presence-- but she nevertheless gestures in the air, recites beneath her words the forbidden druidic languages that coalesce the powers of nature around. At which point, there's a dull flash of energy within the cell. Some of the nearby straw on the ground gets blown away from her form from the general push of air the spell disperses and the impact.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, got a little squirrely on that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The grey hair, the tattered clothes all vanish, revealing beneath it a woman in her early mid-forties or so. Jet black hair pulled into a tight ponytail, but strings of it in front of her face. Still in disarray but nowhere near as wrecked as the previous visage you were presented with. She's wearing nice travel clothes with what looks like some sort of a long duster-like coat that is a little ragged. You can see there's a little stain from being down here for a while. As soon as this moment hits, she pushes back even further, pressing herself against the wall, arms to the side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I must say, you look way better like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Happy?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Extremely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, I'd say so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, so who are you for real?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My name is Anna, and I would like to be set free, if you don't mind. I can be of assistance to "you. I happen to know a lot of information about the people that currently "reside within this castle."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How would you know anything about them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Release me and I'll tell you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to be set free?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell us and we'll release you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've been so forthright in your interest in helping such an old and frail woman. How can I "have any sort of guarantee of my safety should I give you the information you seek? You could very "well slay me in this cell."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That might happen if you're not careful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's Percy doing right now? Where's Percy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you recognize her, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You very much recognize her. You do notice, by the way, her right hand? The sleeve ends. There is no hand there. It is just a missing hand, and the left hand is visible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As far as we can see, unarmed? Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anna?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I would start talking right now or I swear we will not leave this dungeon before you're dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an intimidation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And just as he finishes talking, I throw a dagger a foot away from her head in the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You gave her a fucking dagger? And then it flashes back to you, right? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the dagger which is thrown (whoosh) hits the stone wall next to her and jams itself between two of the stone bricks and gets wedged there for a second. She looks over for a second, reaches up for it and grabs the hilt as it vanishes in a puff of smoke.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She says, "Well, for one thing, I've been here with them for the past five years. I helped them "reestablish their current social control of this city when they left it a pile of flames and "rubble. And their little experiment beneath the castle? "I was one of their chief scientific designers."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tell us about the experiments beneath the castle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "You'll have to ask Sylas or Delilah for that. I don't have all the details or "the reasons behind it, other than the process I was brought in to construct."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I see if she's lying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Make an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a number.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is a number. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? Okay. You get the sense that she's telling the truth. You're not quite sure how far off the truth, but there doesn't seem to be any sort of bald-faced deception in her voice, at this point. She speaks with a confidence and a brusqueness of a person who is frustrated by the circumstance and has no other choice. "I wasn't interested in their zealotry or the whispered "dealings, just the challenge behind the construction. I enjoy challenge. Challenge that "pays, well, (chuckles) I enjoy that even more."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Question two: What are you doing down here, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm down here because my work is done and I wish not to linger with an impending battle. I "don't choose sides; I merely let them fight while I live another day far, far away. I wouldn't have "gotten this far dealing with the people I've dealt with in the past if I had chosen to stick around "under such circumstances, so I tried to leave. It appears Anders saw me packing and decided to gain 'a little favor by turning me in, so they threw me down here, told me to wait out the rest of the "experiment, at least until the ziggurat was complete. So here I am, living amongst rats in a "cell for over a week. That's my reward."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you lose the hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Experiments can be dangerous, sometimes. I dabble with chemicals and alchemical reagents that "can be miscalculated, and I paid a price that will be an ever-present reminder until I can find a way "to fix it. And there are ways."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you looking for ways to get back at the Briarwoods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Based on the way they've treated me here and their possible intent to not even keep up "their end of the bargain now that I'm free to walk away? Perhaps."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you lead us to Cassandra de Rolo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She turns her head with a curious look. "I could, yes. Why do you ask?" She looks at you very intently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That may be what your life is worth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. What else do you wish to know? What else do you need, even, to get me out from behind "these bars? Because I'm growing very uncomfortable and cold here in this cellar."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm casting Friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is good Percy casting Friends or shadow monster casting Friends?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll never know until he and Ripley kill us all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is definitely some creepy happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You stare at her at this point, intent pushing yourself toward the bars, and she's still looking you over like she's searching for some sort of an inclination as to why you're so interested in these particular questions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've been truthful with us so far, correct? You haven't been fudging around or playing games with us, really, have you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've no reason to lie. Worst comes to worst, you kill me where I stand or leave me here "to rot. What do I have to gain by lying at this point? Besides, you've already proven you can see "through quite a few ruses. Apparently."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you'd be happy to help us find Cassandra de Rolo, wouldn't you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This whole town is a ruin of misery, and it has no color. It has no culture. I've grown bored of it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You say you're a scientist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you use magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've no interest in paltry magics. I'm more of one who embraces the sciences as a means of "understanding mystery. My whole purpose here was one giant chemical experiment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then who cast Seeming on you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that isn't to say I have don't have my tricks."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anna. You will take us to Cassandra de Rolo. You will tell us what you know about what's in the basement. You will tell us where to find Lord and Lady Briarwood, and you will tell us where to find professor Anders. And for this, we may let you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm, may. That word, 'may.'"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll let you leave the castle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And if I agree to these terms, you'll release me at this moment? Keep me safe until it "is time for me to take my leave?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We may chain you to a bear, but yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is Clarota all fucking over again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I take off the hat.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Percival." (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's a nervous laugher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have many questions. I found your recent work "very fascinating."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will be happy to give you an up close and very personal demonstration. Unless, of course, you would rather have conversations about other topics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll start with the other topics." She adjusts her coat, regains her composure, and steps up to the bars expectantly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I come out of the shadows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, are we really letting her out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get a chain ready, or a noose of some sort.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we have manacles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's got one hand. How's that going to be useful?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One hand and then one on the bear, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It means there's only one to shoot off to make sure she won't be a problem.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out a pick and I walk up to the gate and I say, he's a very good shot. She's a

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He poops on things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This guy, I've watched turn things into the Jelly of the Month, so I would tread very carefully.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I peek out of the shadows and go, hi. (giggles)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a check lock pick. This will be more difficult than normal because--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I snapped off a thing in there. Sorry about that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to use Luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to use Luck now?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shall I inspire you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't use Luck yet

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not that bad. That's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 20 baseline?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, because of my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Expertise? All right. 20 is exactly what you needed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Skadoosh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the next one. So you take a moment you walk up all slick and (click).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to get down and you spend the next 30 seconds actually managing to get the pin that she has stuck in there out without actually breaking the spring inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry about that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fucking doors!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It never ends!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a minute and a half of awkward quiet as the sound of scraping metal and jimmying thieves' tools, eventually (click).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, (ting) the lock comes loose and the bars (creak) open a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, watch her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) The bear, which at this point has been barely visible, steps out of the shadows, as well--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bear-ly? (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Steps out and presents a very puffed-up Trinket made to look intimidating. (growl) Towards Dr. Anna Ripley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I sense the slightest hint, if I have a moment where I think that you might make a run for it, if I have a moment where I think you may cough inappropriately, I would ask you to think about everything you did to me, and I would like you to know that I have learned so much more than what you taught me that day, and I cannot wait to show you. And I will. But not until I find you again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understood, Percival. Well, then. Shall we?" She steps out of the cell, pushes the bar aside, saunters up past you, steps over, still facing you underneath the torch light.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we shackle her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh? All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll arouse suspicion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd like to gather my things."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Things? They let you have things in a prison cell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're in my room."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to go to your room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would like to."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell us what you need and we'll get it for you, dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Come." And she begins to step up the stairway that leads out of the dungeon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you walk quietly? Please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can hear the slight chuckle in the darkness. She goes, "I haven't lived this long "without learning to step a little gingerly."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go parading through the castle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll follow her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's all follow her, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should check any of the other cells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did. We already checked them all

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (creak) Opens it up and looks out. "Huh. Empty." Holds the door open and says, "Who would like to enter?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You would like to enter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, just giving the offer." And she steps into the room. This is the end of a long hallway that leads to a series of doors on the right and left side, and it opens into a large central entrance chamber to what would be the castle. So she steps in. She's not going too far ahead. She's being very conscious that based on the fact that she has nothing on her and you are very well armed, it would not behoove her to attempt to make a run for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see anything in the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am keeping very sharp eye on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I understand. Looking around. She's taking her steps slowly, and she's looking around corners as you guys progress. The doors that are there-- everyone's being very quiet, just the very gentle sounds of careful footsteps against the smooth stone floor. (footsteps) She turns around, looking at the rest of you a little confused, and goes, "Huh. Usually there are a lot more "individuals frequenting this castle."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe they've been drawn out by the thing that we incited outside that's been going on for like 45 minutes now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feels like a trap.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but there is fighting. Can we hear fighting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're inside the castle right now. You could go and if you want to try and enter one of the rooms to the right or left, you can see if there's a window.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any open doors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the doors are currently closed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just want to see if I sense anything around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Silent. Still. It's unnerving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she have a window in her room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You asking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're at her doorway, aren't we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you've just stepped up to the base floor of the castle. You're on the base floor, on the side of it. You're not even quite sure which way is north.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nobody we're looking for is going to be above us, right? They're going to be below the castle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we don't want her to get her shit in her room. We need to be asking how to get below the castle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you getting?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She wants her weapons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I want to see what she's built, anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would we let her have a weapon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not going to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can't we look at what she's built after we fight them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could be useful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As we're walking, I just want to very gently take my gun--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just feeling a bit nervous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understood." She straightens up a little more and continues walking ever so carefully. Not quite leaning her head or making too many large movements, but definitely still keeping a seemingly nervous eye on how quiet the atmosphere is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I creep over to one of the doors in the room and see if I can hear anything on the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans) 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very, very faint.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see if the door handle is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (click) It's open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I step to the side and push it open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone before you whips around, hearing the noise in the silence. Looking inside, it appears to be a long-untouched music room, a space for hosting individuals where you would have small performances, and there is a very cold fireplace in the far corner. There is a small, circular window that is placed in the center of the room that has a very thick glass pane with cross bar on it that seems to look out. And this is your first view-- for you, especially, since you woke up in the tunnel-- your first view of the outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you go up to the window and look?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm following my sister in, doing the buddy cop thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the entire city of Whitestone down below this elevated part of topography. What you do see, one, are large plumes of smoke, about six or seven of them, all gathered towards what you can tell now is the north side of the city, which is the closest to you. You guys are on the southwest side of the castle, based on the spatial awareness you've now made.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where the more upper-class folk would live, I'm assuming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll perception check, while you're glancing out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That could've been so bad. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was like whee-- oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Love those little (gasps) moments. Taking a moment, you pull your brother in to point out where you're looking. It looks like the gates to the castle are wide open. There are tracks through the mud that lead down the pathway to the bottom, and right where the path from the castle intersects with the outer wall of Whitestone, there is a fray going on right now. It looks like the remnants of whatever sort of undead army that wasn't destroyed by you guys, combined with what may have been a number of the individuals who normally guard the castle, have all been momentarily distracted by the rebellion you guys have started, and for the time being, at least, have left elements of this castle unguarded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice. I would loot, but it's Percival's home. Do we see anything that looks like it could be a doorway leading down, or anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've gone up, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're on the main level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to try to get my sister first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know, Percival, how to go under?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Unless there's something new, then yes. I was born here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You almost lost me. I almost lost you. You will wear this as needed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will wear it. Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk out ahead of her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pull the hood up. So you get advantage on stealth checks. As you guys step into the hallway and move forward, Pike's physical form is drifting along you guys as she takes each step. You can see she's stopped a little bit and she's lost in thought for a moment. And she looks at the rest of you and says, "There is a great evil here. It's--" And you can see part of her form flicker and shake and almost blink for a moment, and then she reaches forward and says, "Something's willing me "away. I ca--" And with that, her form just vanishes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you feel this warmth on your hand, Vax, and the symbol of Sarenrae that you have embedded in your glove. You look down, and it has a slight glow to it, similar to the color that her divine energy form had taken. And you see it just slowly fade, but not entirely. The symbol seems to just have this general very faint radiation. A reminder, or at least what small semblance of a connection to her in this dark, dark place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Goodbye, Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before we move on from that foyer, can we see the front door from where we're at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you go another 20, 30 feet ahead to the end of this hallway, it should open up into the main entrance chamber and you would be able to see the doors.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we're not there yet, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a moment and I have an epiphany, and I'm going to shift my form into a castle guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex, what you saw through the window, should we move through the castle quickly because it's unguarded?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess. There's fighting going on now. I don't want to eat right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get it on the break.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw fighting, lots of fighting. I feel like if we're going to move, we need to do it quickly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're on a clock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anna. I lower the gun and let her move forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't need to lower it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She continues forward, heads towards the rest of the hallway into the main entrance chamber of the castle, very carefully looking about. She gestures to the rest of you to follow. And as you follow along beside her, you can see the two large front doors that situate the entrance, the main entrance to Whitestone--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they are closed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have 20 caltrops. Can I throw ten of them in front of the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They scatter and clink against the ground, scraping against the stone and eventually coming to a stop loosely around the two doors, which are about eight feet wide each, so 16 feet of it, so you're scattering about one every foot and a half.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I watched him do that, and I shrug and I reach into my pack, and I throw 30 more of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The area has a little more coverage on there, but nevertheless there is a nice cluster of nasty spiked caltrops now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a good idea. Very smart there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, using your noggin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was that a thought for the day, then? Don't sprain yourself. We need you later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ripley starts making her way up the stairs, and the staircase ascends for a good 15 feet up before it splits into two curved stairways that come around to a second landing to the second floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So hang on one second, real quick, he's dressed as a guard?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and cast Enhance Ability on you. For charisma.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't need it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you do now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has it worn off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lasts for a minute, so yeah, it's worn off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it only lasts for a minute?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Friends only lasts for a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had enhance charisma on for a while, but now it's gone, so if you do it, what I had is gone--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pour some sugar on, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do it. I'm going to enhance. In case we get busted. So you'll have advantage on persuasion rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you have advantage on all charisma-based ability checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, putting that down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, no one forget that we have Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, if I put the holy oil on things, it lasts for a few hours, right? It lasts for half a day or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it lasts for about an hour after application.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait until we're in the thick of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The oil will eventually just drift off, as it is an oil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It dries and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it dries and gets rubbed off. It lasts about an hour after application.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head to her room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you mind?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you want? What's in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My belongings."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to see what you've been working on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." She opens the door. (creak)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll wait outside and stand watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk in with her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stay right next to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know these rooms are generally very well decorated, just in case. Decorations have been taken off. This room looks very minimalistic and for the most part more for function than anything else. You see there is plain sheets on the bed, most of the room's open space is taken by a long table that's been put here that has a series of alchemical glassware, and you can see what looks to be small containers that contain different materials and powders and seems like she does her own work here. There are two open drums on the side, and there is this very caustic smell to the air. There is an acerbic tinge to the nose as soon as the room enters. There's just this ever-present, very heavy fresh rust smell to the room. She walks to the far end. Underneath the desk that contains this alchemical setup, she pulls a small chest out--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I watch very carefully.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She brings the chest to the top. She opens it up, and on the inside you can see just some folded clothing. She moves the clothing off to the side and she pulls out what looks like relatively simple leather armor. "May I?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very, very slowly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Creepy? I'm going to put her through the wall if she moves in the wrong way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, I almost killed you in Stillben.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Huh. I didn't know that was you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was kind of curious if you had figured it out or not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell you what, I'll hold onto that armor for the time being.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's partway into it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you can take it off. We'll put it in the Bag of Holding. You can put it on after we're done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy sigh) She folds the tunic portion over the chest piece and hands it to you, pulls out some of the arm braces and leg guards and hands those over as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Show me your work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Places it. At which point she reaches in and pulls out a metallic construction that you all see looks not unlike in shape and purpose as the Pepperbox that you've seen Percy use all this time, though it has only a single barrel and has a small rotating four-part chamber to it. It's a little more refined than his construction, and you can see now part of the alchemical setup she has in here actually is, and you recognize this as you get close, part of it is designed in the creation of ammunition and refining the powder that is used by this process. You see a series of notes that are off to the side that have sketches outlined of your Pepperbox, though not really accurate. Almost like they were recalled from various individuals that had seen it in person and given accounts of it. She's been keeping a very close log of eyewitness accounts of your weaponry, apparently, for some time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a fangirl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, she is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm disappointed. I was expecting something more imaginative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "You've seen my room, have you not? I prefer function."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (scoffs) Hack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches down and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep your hands away and step back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll give those to you when it's time to leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How am I to defend myself should things go, and pardon my term, ass-up?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you planning on fighting with us? Helping us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You say you won't release me until you've finished what you're doing here. I assume that what "you're doing here is ending the current reign of those who rule this town. I can't assume that's "going to end with a conversation."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lean my head in and say, the goliath could turn your head into paste now, if you like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell you what, we'll take the weapons and give it to you if we need your help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let her have the armor. As a sign of good faith.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if it's enchanted armor?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And give me your ammunition. And when it's time, I will hand some to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you're leaving her the weapons but no ammo?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm taking the weapon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The weapon's useless.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't care.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches over and grabs a little pouch inside the side with change. Puts a little bit of money to the side there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are in those vials?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She reaches in, pulls them out, shows them to you. And you recognize the color. She goes, "What, you think you're the only one who doesn't occasionally suffer a wound? I have to look after "myself, as well." It's a greater healing potion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One of them is? Or they both are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one she pulled out and showed you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the other one? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Really?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really. Lest your brains leak out your ears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls out the other one. "This is in case things go really poorly and I need to uphold "my sense of self-preservation."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs angrily)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Convince us to let you keep it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It allows me to make a fleeting escape on the air as opposed to by foot."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, then give it to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, the glass almost shatters with the amount of frustrating force she slams it into your hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Careful. That's made of glass, darling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was only stretching. No need to get testy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have a Potion of Flying in your inventory right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And god forbid you'll see how gracious we're feeling when we find Cassandra De Rolo unhurt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Grog! Grog with the steal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I get a piece of paper!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, Potion of Flying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, do you have your shit? Can we get out of here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slips back into the hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything you could use, Percival?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was there any more black powder? I've taken all of her ammunition and black powder, I suppose. Anything else that looks useful to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's intelligence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. Well, hell. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? You give a quick once-over of the room. The place is pretty barren. Other than the large drums of what seems like three inches of some weird caustic substance at the bottom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate what you've done with the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a recurring substance. A lot of the vials are based around it. There's a recurring theme of this caustic liquid throughout all of her instruments.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll have a conversation about what she was trying to do off-camera so I can have a better understanding of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In what way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figure I may poke you later to get a better understanding, just so we don't have to bore other people with her technical accoutrements, but I would like, at some point, an out-of-character understanding of what I'm looking at. Of what I could discern about what I'm looking at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or we could have it on camera.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to kill something tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! We were also running out of time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There are people fighting right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When we defeat the Briarwoods, you can come back and explore this room to your heart's content.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Touche.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'd still be your place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, to your sister, is it?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Up or down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This would be on the other side of this floor."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think you know the room." And you know that you're not too far from your sister's room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They let her keep her room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See you later. I go stealth. 20. No, 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes to the door and doesn't touch it yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A quick question before I open this door. Am I going to have a violent reaction towards you when I open it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I certainly hope not."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good. (sighs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stand right behind her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I motion to everyone, stay back, open the door, and I push Dr. Ripley into the room, with me behind her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What little bit of light that peeks in from the hallways in the poorly-lit interior of the castle for this time of day. You can see there is her canopy bed. You can see there is her cabinet in the corner, but the room appears to be dark and empty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Torch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there any wall sconces around? Torch wall sconces on the outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few along the walls that are currently burnt out at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take a torch out of the Bag of Holding and I take the Firebrand War Hammer, ignite it, and hand the torch to Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You glance about the room. It's lived in. The actual bed covers themselves are pulled off. You can see she has a vanity mirror cabinet in the far corner. It's all put away. The chair's open a little, like it was stepped out of. The room is absent of anyone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I walk over to the closet. I open it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You open the closet. She has outfits there. Many of them don't appear to have been worn in a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Looking for signs of life with the paper on the desk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You search her desk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's have a real roll. That will do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a really good roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Classic Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was doing this on Group Hug, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also do find a stack of paper, a series of partially-written notes and ink and quill that are false stops. Letters that were partially written and then crossed off, or mistakes were made or they never got finished that are all written to Archibald. And they talk about the general unrest in the city. Preparation for a possible coming rebellion. Discussing past failures but the intent to try again. There's a theme through a lot of these notes that this appears to be one of the methods she was using to communicate in the outside of the castle, and was her role in previous attempts at freeing the people of Whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's not here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Ripley's also like, "Well, if she's not here, she's somewhere else in "the castle. I assume."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where would she be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't spend my time wondering or curious about her well-being! I just know that she is "usually here."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anna. I'm going to take a leap of faith and believe, contrary to all evidence, that you are a smart woman. I pull out the gun, and I put it to her head. Now. If you were the Briarwoods, where would you put my sister?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An important question here, Percy. Are they keeping her, or is she here of her own volition?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. And if you don't know, make me believe it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know she's not allowed anywhere near the ziggurat or near our distillery."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Distillery? I pull the gun away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She breathes a sigh of relief. "That's been largely my project as part of this entire "endeavor. All right, so when I was brought in here, I was tasked to experiment with the design "and create large amounts of a very, very delicately prepared acidic compound, one that "could dissolve the stone of your whitestone and distill it down into pure residuum. This would allow "the bulk creation of a very powerful magical essence for use in construction materials that we "could instill and use apparently for this ziggurat, as well as other such things. Thus, that "was my main reason for being here. We were ahead of schedule, and I completed the bulk of our "development weeks ago, and I no longer had much of a purpose here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What schedule were you trying to keep? What was the deadline?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We were trying to create enough continuous acid to develop enough residuum to be used in the "reconstruction of the ziggurat. Once I had developed enough of the compound to where we no "longer had to create more, my purpose was complete. I had no interest beyond that. The rest "is gibberish to me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you're telling me that somewhere in this castle there is a storage facility full of caustic acid that dissolves the very stones of this castle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Mark that. She looks at you, goes, "Yes. If you've seen the vents of greenish fume "billowing out in the garden, that is where the distillery exhausts to."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, this is interesting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ziggurat? What's it for?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What exactly does it do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hurry up. Time is of the essence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Someone they've been working with. Someone I've not met, someone who I have no interest in "inquiring within."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A name. Give us a name, girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was not given a name. They don't speak of this individual's name. They are very secretive "about it. They paid well, they gave me land, they gave me a title, and when things were done, I was "to go free. Which is why I was not happy in which the predicament you found me, made me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where can we find this ziggurat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her eyes trail down to the floor. "The ziggurat itself is, well, based on the tunneling "structure, the distillery's direction? Right beneath the city of Whitestone."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The city or this castle?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're going to destroy this fucking city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it underneath the Sun Tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, not the distillery. The ziggurat might be."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh dear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're going to-- yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they still melting down the whitestone for magical energy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I don't believe so, not for weeks. We finished that process for quite a bit now."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you're done melting the whitestone, but you still have a whole bunch of this acidic compound kicking it in a warehouse somewhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, not in a warehouse. That's all kept stored underneath the garden of the castle."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if they're even here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'd better move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Downstairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You were asking about Anders, though. Do you wish to pay him a visit?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (growls)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a smile on her face. She does not like Anders.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He was your sister's keeper."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's trying to-- Percy, la la la. Percy, come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's probably with the Briarwoods.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, he's not there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm off sitting in the shadows, but I say, Percival, we need to cut off the head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it possible that my sister would be with him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's very possible if she's not here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anna, shut. Up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I only say because my whole--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Anna!" And I notch an arrow and aim it right at her throat. "Shut. Up."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where would this professor be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I imagine his study. It's around the corner."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll check his study, and then we'll go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just his study, then we'll go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even if he's there, if she's not there, we'll leave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go. Lead the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're running out of time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brother, run and check the study.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start running towards the direction that was described.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go towards the under--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lead the way down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No talking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're going down?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're not leaving Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're heading down. He's going to catch up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She begins making her way towards the landing that leads to the stairway down, whereas you stealth off in that direction. You find your way around that corner. Go ahead and roll perception.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As I'm moving, by the way, it's minor, but I take out Clarota's (sniffs, groans) metallic cap and put it on, and I also whip out this other cloak that I've been looking at and whip it around. You're not here. And now continue on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So both will attune to you at your next short rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, all right, excellent. It's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you've worn Clarota's thing before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's two things. Moving forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you make your way down the hallway, you hear what sounds like a muffled female voice from behind a distant doorway. Like a small cry in pain or worry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I need to stealth again, or am I already stealthed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled stealth before this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. It was like 23 before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Carefully.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It leads down. There are three doorways on this side of the hallway. The central door there is where you hear the noise coming from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm sticking my ear to the door, and I'm going to listen for a full minute to see what I hear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They should be close."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to gently try the door handle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It is not locked. It does turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to push it like one inch in and try to peek in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just the tip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm having deja vu.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. We've been here before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When I tell you, you'll say what I told you to "say. Got it?" And you can see she has tears streaking down her face she's like (gasping).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I run at the door and I kick it open and throw at him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we take off running towards him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dick!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a trap. It's such a trap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (laughs) So you have a surprise round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Sneak Attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both those individuals right there. Go ahead and make your attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What am I looking at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's some tables around with some chairs. There are these large bookshelves that hold this side and there's the fireplace in the far corner right there. Flames. Warming the room. There's a small chandelier on the ceiling that has magical light emanating from it that gives the room this warm glow. You don't care right now because you're throwing a fucking dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right. But he's behind her a bit, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's holding her right there with a dagger to her throat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I recently added the sharpshooter feat, so three-quarter and half cover means nothing to me. So I'm going to aim for his eye that's peeking out the side. All three are going right in his eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So here's the first. The first is 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, the second is 26. As you can tell, I've been screaming monster sounds. My voice is a little ragged. 26 on the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And 16 on the third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 misses. But the first two strike true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh! But it's surprise, so the first one is doubled because it's automatically a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what's that now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it was 39, so now it's 60, 78. For the first one. Ten for the second.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So 88 points of damage. You just went 80 miles per hour on your first turn. As you kick the doors open. (whoosh) The first dagger, he sees it coming towards him for a second and attempts to dodge out of the way, and as he moves this eye out of the way, the dagger (impact noise) right into this one, he screams out (screaming) in pain as it just plunges into his eye socket. Not deep enough to actually hit any brain, but enough to definitely take that eye out as any sort of viable method. The second one just hits him in the shoulder and a reaction to that, Cassandra screams out, "No, run! It's a trap!" At which point, he takes his dagger and just runs it across her throat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see crimson start to pour down the front as she (choking). Go ahead and roll initiative.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 22.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would she be saying it's a trap if it's not her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could be a peasant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, at this point as you throw the dagger, you're still at the doorway and you hear what sounds like two sources of metal clanking together. You can't really see a source, but you hear other sounds in the room. What are you doing with your action?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am running at him and stabbing the shit out of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you cross this boundary, I need you to go ahead and immediately make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use luck again. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's two lucks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 17 for constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great. All right, so as you step across the threshold of the room, the tile in front of you all of a sudden bursts in a flash of blue, painfully cold energy, like there's a concentrated moment of shredding ice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I able to use evasion for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, technically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So if I succeed, I take no damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's fallen onto her hands and knees.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going into his guts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One, two, three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One, two, three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, and I'm going to turn the poison on for the poison dagger, which I'm going to use for the second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just flip the little switch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it just drips. So nine for the first, eight for the second, plus the poison is-- shit, I didn't copy it down here. I think it's 1d12. Let's say it's 1d12, because I can't remember. If anyone wants to correct me, they can. Five points of poison added to the five is 13. And then the last dagger is nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you rush up to him and shank him repeatedly in the side, the breastplates deflecting part of the blow, but you're managing to find openings in the side, and you go for a shoulder and jam it underneath his arm, through his ribcage, and he screams out (yelps) in pain, and you can see there's blood pouring out the side of his mouth. And the dagger's returned by now, but there's this giant gaping, bleeding wound on the side of his face where one of his eyes is completely ruined. He looks both surprised, angered, and very, very confused about the way things suddenly happened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right so that's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it, I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, he's going to go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're six seconds in, Taliesin.

lines.name: MATT
