lines.text: But before all that happens, Professor Anders in front of you, wounded and not looking terribly happy at the moment, is going to use his action to attempt to cast Confusion on you. So he goes to step back, and (grunting) just releases his hand in front of you as one functioning eye bores into you as he screams out. You can feel the pressure towards your head. Go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wisdom, which I have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, wisdom saving throw because of that anyway, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is going to attempt to step back--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, attack him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get attack of opportunity on him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22? Okay, that does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, takes a bonus action as he steps back, "(grunts) Come. Take this inspiration to defeat my foe!" And he lends an inspiration dice to one of the armored creatures stepping forward towards you. Now it's their turn. Both these armored creatures pull out swords, and they lift up the shields that they had to their sides, and they rush into you from two sides right there. You see this as they rush up to you: they're not really touching the ground, they're gliding across it. So the first one is going to attempt to strike you with two attacks of its longsword. That is a 14?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second one is a 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The second one now is going to go ahead and take two swings at you. That is an 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but I'll use uncanny dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To reduce the damage by half?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the first strike hits you for 13 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, half that or all of that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be half that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half that. Okay, so seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. And then that's going to be a 24 to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this is not halved. Okay, that's 12 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, now to Cassandra's turn. She is on the ground just spilling out her life essence onto the ground. She's clutching at her throat and is like (gasping). You hear that horrible sucking sound of her feeling her life drain from her. She's not unconscious, but she doesn't have long for this world. All right, that brings us to the top of the round. The rest of you guys are now rushing, I assume, dash motion, making your way as fast as you can to that side. Due to distance, you would all get to the end of this hallway, about there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that including sprint?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the dash action, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's full dash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're in a new combat round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What the hell!?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! Percy's pissed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I Percy'd again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He Percy'd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who got him that dice? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The golden snitch is powerful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I was on Group Hug last week with somebody else's dice, and it was comedy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just you, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are the anti-Wheaton.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm the anti-Wheaton.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you guys were to play in the same group, all RPGs would fold into themselves and no longer exist. It's like the end of Timecop. It'll be terrible. Okay, so initiatives. We have 25 to 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. Remember your advantage, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the second roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Percy at the top.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Feral instinct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and you were at-- I think your initiative was 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't remember. It was early 20s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Early 20s, yeah, so it'd be Percy, Vax. 20 to 15?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, sorry. Might have jumped the gun a bit there. I'm excited. Sorry. I'm bringing up the ranks anyway, I think. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, all right. Vex, what'd you get?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, I said Vex! I got it right this time!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you're from California.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, I'm from Florida. All right, so Percy, you're up first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I drag Ripley with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, but you'll be moving half movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Leave her. Somebody else--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So as my bonus action before anything happens I'm going to tell her, she lives, you show us where the entrance to the caverns are, you walk with your things. And run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You do understand that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, she's all about this fucking shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Full movement?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Full movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's your full turn there. All right, that ends your turn, Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have one healing potion left, and I'm going to take it and stick it into this girl's mouth and empty it and maybe drip a little on her neck as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe hold her neck. Make sure it goes down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you have to roll to heal. You pull back, and it's a really unsettling thing as you pull up her head to try and feed her the potion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 2d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a regular healing potion?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Moderate? I think it's called moderate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, got it right here. That's 2d4 plus two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So four. Six. And then I want to step in front of her, between her and that one, and then stab the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the blood goes away on the ground around her neck from the splashing of the potion, which has vanished entirely, and you can see she's (gasping).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's right on the edge, but she's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So is that the bonus action, or is that the action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was your action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Action, okay. By the way, I'm realizing I didn't click my boots, so I did one two three before, and the third one missed, so luckily that worked out, but I'm not clicking those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for the reminder. So used to dagger, dagger, dagger. I'm like, "Wait, no."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I just step between them, and that's all I can do, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you move into there, great. That's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I mean between her and the closest one to her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so much better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For those who don't know, we have a top-down camera for the players, which is really helpful for them to know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dead sprint after Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and your speed is?

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: (heavy footsteps)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's up, Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get all the way up into here, but that's all you can do this turn. Yeah, so you're (heavy footsteps) bounding down the hall. You push past Percy and rush into the room, and you see a young girl on the ground, doubled over, barely conscious. You see Vax stepping in front of these weird, glowing armored creatures, and at the back of the room, there's a man with bleeding, gaping eye socket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck did you do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Welcome to the party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm up? I run as fast as my little legs will take me. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't see them, so I'll just inspire-- Who's going to get in there next? Who's behind me? Can I inspire people that I can't see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think they have to be in your sight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can see me, though whether or not you want to inspire me at this point is definitely debatable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can inspire somebody else in the hallway, if you'd like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. They can't even make it in the next turn, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but we'll keep it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They won't let go.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: (sing) Arrows and bows!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the beat hits you, you feel yourself a little more sure shot with any arrows. Take your d10 inspiration die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So, that brings us to-- all right. Professor Anders, now, is taking his turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Professor Anders.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Professor Anders.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Professor Anders.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mr. Anderson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sees this giant creature in the room looming and he reaches up and closes up one eye and goes, "You. Do this for me." And as he looks at you for a second, he releases another spell and you feel a familiar arcane grasp begin to curl over the back of your mind. Go ahead and roll a wisdom saving throw with advantage because of your Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, baby. One more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Your brain, not tempered against these types of magics and having previously failed you before. You feel your will no longer become your own as now you are an instrument of destruction controlled by Professor Anders. You've been Dominated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. Dominate goliath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to kill that motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I mean, he looks to you and goes, "Kill that one!" And points to Vax, and you look down at Vax with a grin as the blood-letting you've wanted so bad, your target lies before you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hulk versus Wolverine! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Anders's turn--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember what he did to your beard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, is it me grinning, or is it dominated Grog? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moves to here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hulk versus Wolverine, man. I'm excited by that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double eights. Can't roll shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why advantage? I'm just curious. Give it to me, but what's the advantage from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have advantage against you because they moved into flanking position.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because they're in flanking. Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, for those who're curious about it, it is an optional rule in the DMG. It exists. Second attack. Three and a four. I can't roll!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sucking sounds)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this guy just whiffs with both of his weapon strikes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're sucking his energy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (raspy) I have your power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 on the next strike.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Spoke too soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two natural 20s.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a miss and a natural 20 on the first attack, and then a natural 20 on the first roll of the second attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spoke too soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take on the first hit--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mock fate, fate punches you in the mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm running like hell. Running, running, running. Can I see? Can I peek around the corner just to see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just peek around the corner and see the circumstance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I see Cassandra?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Healing Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know it's her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Either way. Whoever it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know what she looks like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just do what you're going to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Healing Word.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Family resemblance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Family resemblance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say given the circumstances, you have an inkling that someone's in danger there. And the calling of Jenga. So go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Okay, good to know. All righty. That's your turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm with Anna. Trinket-- I tell him to hold onto her and drag her along with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he clamps down on her arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So one, two. He's going to attempt to grapple her. Go ahead and roll an athletics check with advantage because she's not expecting it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket grabs onto the scruff of her coat and begins pushing forward. They both get the rest of half of his movement because he's forcing her forward. That's as far as he can get.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I can keep running? I can run all the way up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your speed? Is it 30?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get about there, right at the edge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I can shoot an arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's your movement and then your dash action to get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ripley is just going to stay put for the time being. She's held by a bear and being pushed along. She's just "Ugh."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With no weapons and no armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leather armor, basically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Leather armor, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run in. I can move six, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move six squares, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One, two. Can I get a good view of Professor Anders and maybe get a little cover from the dining room table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can a little bit, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'll take my cover. I'm going to pull out--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Already been a rough day for him, and your eye slips down, and for the first time in a long time, you see on the ground before you, clutching her throat, no wound or blood splatter but clutching her throat and breathing heavily, your sister Cassandra. And you look back up at Anders and you feel the burning rage begin to billow up inside you, and as you walk in the room towards the center of the table, you guys who are able to see the room, you see now, from outside of his sleeves, outside from under his coat, there's blackish purple smoke beginning to (whoosh) billow out from behind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it seem more extreme than it has been in the past?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seemed pretty extreme in the past. It just started; you don't know. Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bonus, I pull off my hat of disguise, drop it on the floor. And I'm going to just unload at that motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His hand falls away at a moment of realization, eye goes wide. "Percy..."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shot one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, for the love of god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, when it counts.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: (ricochet noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the frustration, the rage and such, you pull up your gun and as you go to fire, the bullet gets caught in the chamber and it almost ejects the entire barrel from the front of it. It's not too difficult to repair, but it definitely upsets the current flow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to attempt to repair it really quickly. Trying to remember how to do that because I hate it. (mumbling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it an action or is it an attack to do? Should say under the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Action, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you have to use your next turn to try and repair it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) So I'm just going to sit and scream a little bit. (shouting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you can see that this whole moment here, as the smoke pours out from the front of the gun, you yell out angrily and there is this unnatural bassy reverb from your scream that shakes the room. Anders actually takes a step back from this and is looking about the room, and finds himself basically trapped in the far corner of his study.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you better not!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use disengage, and I'm going to hop over Cassandra towards Anders and stab him in the other eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First attack is 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second attack is 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, ten on the first, ten on the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, question? I asked if I could hit the eye. Did I hit the eye?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no. It's one of those things where a Sneak Attack would be an eye shot for this one. You go and try and stab towards the eye, and he pulls away; he knows what's coming and uses that inertia to jam it into his side and stab a second time in there. So yeah, no purchase in the eye, unfortunately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. And I'm squared off right in front of him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, just right in front of him. That ends your turn. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So when you're dominated, does that mean charmed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not directly, specifically controlling you right now, but he told you, "Attack him," so you have to use all the things at your disposal to now attack him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I can't try and break the domination? Or rage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. You get a saving throw at the end of your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I only get two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One. You step over Cassandra, (impact noise) stepping on the back of her leg, and find your way right there, which is flanking him between Anders, so you have advantage on both your attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really trying not to enjoy this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) With your flaming war hammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of slashing damage. No, sorry, bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bludgeoning, yeah. And fire. 20, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of bludgeoning and fire damage with the second strike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am on my feet, but I am swaying back and forth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unexpectedly, these two titanic slams hit you from behind. The first one throws you into Anders for a second. Anders then pushes you away, and as you are still reeling from the impact, you look up and see the hammer come down, and (whack) you move your head out in time, preventing you from being squished, but the impact hits your shoulder and the side of your neck, and your whole body crumples into itself. You cry out in pain instinctively, just (screams) from the hit. And your whole world blurs for a second as you're barely keeping yourself on your feet. Grog, that ends your turn. You can make another saving throw with advantage to try and shrug the effect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Add wisdom right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. With that, the momentary controlled bloodshed fades. Your mind becomes your own, and what little bit of remorse you may feel for the battered Vax in front of you, you can't help but laugh a little bit. But then you turn your attention to the one who bent your will, and your rage begins to swell up inside you. So that ends your turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I continue my long journey into the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just get past there, and you can see into the room. You have visual on, yeah, pretty much everything in the room from there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I have to make a ranged shot if I'm to do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I see? Can I see how rough Vax is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At a glance, it's hard to tell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm bleeding out my mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's also facing away from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Looks normal to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Grog and Vax facing off the guy in the corner. You see two of these large armored entities.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll go for them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wand of Magic Missiles. And I'll shoot three at the one at the left. That's the first charge, and then use three additional charges on the one on the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. How many charges were restored in the wand from your last long rest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I roll every day, and I restored five and I had used five, so it's back to normal. I have seven total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're casting three on one and then--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An additional three on the other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. So that's 3d4 plus three to each one. Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right, 3d4. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (magical sound effects) Releasing the wand on both flicks of your wrist, you can see these bursts of arcane energy swirl around and slam into each one of these creatures.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 3d4 plus three? Is that right? Is that how it works, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so five (mumbles), eight. Lame. And (mumbles) nine, no wait. Yes, nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. (explosion noise) The impact hits. You see the armor shake for a second and look angered and frustrated for what a faceless arcane entity in armor could, and both heads just go (shhhh) and look in your direction simultaneously. That ends your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, and I will inspire Grog. (sings) This is the dawning of the age of a-Grog-ius. Age of a-Grog-ius. A-Grog-ius! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The words are lost on you, but it's a nice theme. You take a d10, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not quite my jam, but I'll still take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn. Anders, frustrated by the whole circumstance and on the cusp of a really bad circumstance, is going to attempt to cast Dimension Door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I knew it. I knew he was going to do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I get an attack? A reaction attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not unless you have-- there's a feat that lets you do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I think it's mage slayer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't have that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I see him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you see him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take out my broken shawm and I (piercing whistle). And I cast Counterspell on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Oh lord bards. Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I have to tell a level, don't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can tell me what level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I know, because he's a bard, what he's doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are very familiar with the spell. It is a 4th-level spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I cast it at fourth level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Then there is no roll. With that, he takes a moment to finish casting. You see there's a moment where this bit of purple arcane energy, familiar to most of you as Scanlan's escapes, begins to sparkle behind him and as he goes to step into it, the shawm shrieks out into the room, he (groans) reaches up and covers his eye as it almost seems to be shrill to his head and cause the pain to pulse and the doorway just slams behind him. (panting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get used to it, because I am! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one is going to turn and go for Percy. Sees this billowing as you're stuck there trying to fix the gun, and just rushing towards you with its shield forward, its horrible, jagged longsword in the air arcing towards you. Two strikes versus you. That'll be a 19?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, first strike, you take nine points of slashing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go down. Second strike, because it's still going for you, hits automatically. It's an auto critical. You fail two death saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be a nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to use its inspiration die. Add nine to that, so 18.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 18? That's my armor class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (evil laugh) Bards! I'm sorry. I don't get to use them very often. So that is 11 points of slashing damage. And the other strike-- oh, that's a natural 18, so yeah, that will be... cocked. Oh, only eight points of slashing damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So 19 points of slashing damage, total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. (whooshing) And it's painful, but not a huge thing at this point. You're so focused right now on the weapon. All right. That ends their turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I see Vax down? Which one is he on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax is right there. You see him get slashed from behind, fall to the ground, and you see it raise a blade again and jam it into his torso, pull it out, and there's a streak of blood that just spatters across the ceiling from the force of the arc.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I think you saw that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So I'm going to move around, tuck in the door a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you move in and you see this. As you rush into the room, you see this arc happening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, right behind that door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there, yeah. That'll be pretty much your movement to get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to duck down, crouch on the floor. I'm going to cast-- first I'm going to-- god I'm so nervous-- I'm going to use Healing Word on Vax, and heal that motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At what level?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're like

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's unconscious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I-- there wasn't even any rolls for that, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're unconscious and a creature hits you, you automatically fail a death saving throw and if it's a critical hit, which if you're unconscious a hit is an automatic critical, it's technically two death saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and just to understand the whole breakdown, but where do the three rolls come in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If nobody hits you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, if nobody hits, got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if nobody hits you and it's your turn, you roll to see if you-- but if something keeps hitting you while you're down? Can kill you pretty quick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like two hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But he just hit zero hit points, so whatever I bring will bring him over, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and your death saves go away. It's per turn. Per time you go down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm just going to do a-- I'm sorry, a level one Healing Word for right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, which gives you 12 hit points. And then I'm going to use my bonus action to cast Grasping Vine, and I'm going to take the vine and I'm going to wrap it around--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your source?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which source?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Next to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So right here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing with it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to wrap it around Cassandra's feet, her ankle, and I want to pull her toward me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull her over to the side and she gets pulled across the ground, and she's on her back now looking up. Her eyes are a little starry-eyed, but she's (panting). Looks very confused, and her eyes are still adjusting to the whole circumstance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I say, "Hi! Just hang on." And that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. All right. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So I saw him go down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like he's awake now to me? I'm mean, it was all happening very quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea. This all happens very quickly. You just saw your brother take a huge--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I scream and I run towards him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I slide down on my knees and slide across the room and try to cast Healing Word the minute-- or cast Cure Wounds the minute I get to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You won't get close enough to do it, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I slide down and slide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check. For this circumstance, due to the circumstances with your brother being on the ground, I'll let this be a little more intense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With inspiration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With inspiration. That is-- wait, hold on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Acrobatics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Acrobatics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good. 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, all right. With that, you rush forward, just seeing this tunnel vision image of Vax on the ground, blood pooling under his form. You dart forward, slam on your knees and begin preparing the spell as you skid across the stone floor of the study. You reach out and your hands meet his form, stopping you in the process just as the surge of healing energy jolts through his body. So you can go ahead and cast it on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to cast that at 3rd level. So that's 3d8. Where are my d8s? That was the worst roll! Nine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you heal nine hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay, because I slid to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was amazing. I'll never forget it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay, that's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and Trinket keeps dragging her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Forward? Okay. That ends your turn. All right, go ahead and roll an athletics check for Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, okay. It's going to count even though it slipped out of my hand. It's eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And now that she's disengaged, she's going to...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She smoke-bombed out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She ain't got no weapons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Trinket does get an attack of opportunity on her as she runs past.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Trinket does. Come on, Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, he's going to bite her. Can he cannonball her as an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No? Not so much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine. All right

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait! Oh, no. I've got to roll for attack first, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was not what I was doing. So that's 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good. That's way better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has no armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't know what I'm doing. What is going on? I never attack with Trinket. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cautionary tale in there somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She runs past. The whole area is obscured for Trinket. Trinket for the moment really has no idea really where she went as she rushed past, and bit out and is now giving out this (bear growl) notification growl sound, but in the chaos right now, it's not catching your attention as your brother nearly died before you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends her turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to break-- first off, I'm going to fix my gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make your roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make my roll. Come on. What do I have to roll? (muttering) I hit the difficulty. Does that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If that had been a slightly bigger fuck-up, that would have been-- oh god! Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So your gun's functional, but that's your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use an action surge anyway, so it doesn't matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to break off from this guy, and I'm going to rush towards Professor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, gets an attack of opportunity on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go ahead. Don't care.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guy rolls a 14.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you just (whoosh) duck under it instinctually. It comes toward you. Eyes forward, you duck underneath the blade.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I push him in the face. I don't care.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you get right up to there, and you can see Anders backing away as you approach.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to unload in him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There is Percy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anti-Wheaton.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, let's see, that's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. This is the critical.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, this is the critical which is seven, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 20 with fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How close to him do I get? And this was without smoke damage, I might add.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get one more step up there. You can take the shots as you're stepping towards him, unloading.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm unloading as I walk towards him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first one (gunshot) blasts out the shoulder. You can see the bone exposed, the metal breastplate sundered by the bullet, as he backs up (gasping) As you're walking towards him, he begins shouting, "Percival, you disappoint us all. All you had to do was die like a good de Rolo."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one (gunshot) into his chest, and you can see the actual breastplate bends inward to the wound and he's (choking noise) spitting out blood from his mouth as he bends forward. "This land has "a greater destiny. You and that fool Ripley, you place your faith in toys and dust. You seek the "transient truths."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How close am I to him at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're stepping up to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you're doing this, as you're pull the mask down, he says, "I die to rise again. We are "his blood."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put my gun in his mouth to shut him the fuck up. "You're the face I saw when murder "entered my heart. This is your doing." And I pull the trigger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, a resounding blast (explosion noise) echoes through the room. The back of his head just scatters across the wall behind him. The top of his head folds in a little bit from the lack of a substantial base, and he tumbles backwards, releasing the gun with a limp (splat) onto the ground behind. You're still holding the Pepperbox in front of you, hands shaking. As you hold it there, looking at it, you can see there's a flash of purple energy across the barrel that has Anders's name across it and (fluttering noise) the name burns away, leaving the barrel blank.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (heavy breathing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Smoke begins to subside a little bit. It's still there, but it seems like at the moment, it has this release aspect to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that is your turn. Vax you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How close are the suits of armor to me? I can't tell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one over here, and there's one-- technically it's right next to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right next to me? And am I still prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still prone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So how much movement does it take to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half your movement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half my movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't give him an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm going to get up, and I'm going to use disengage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a bonus action, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and I'm going to skip back into the corner, and at this point I can throw one dagger at that suit of armor, so I'm going to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have no voice left. That is an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage, all righty. Great, okay. Let's see here now. That ends your turn. I had the list down here. All right. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I flanked by two suits of armor or just one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, there's just one right next to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll turn to him and rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Regular rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Regular rage, and swing away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Classic rage, we call it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Classic rage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good old classic rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. And 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get three hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah, just two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought rage-- oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Believe me, I know. 17 with the fire damage. First one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18 on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. So as you slam your hammer twice into it, the armor dents. You can see now, the energy that's holding it together is flickering, almost like the arcane entity that resides within it is having a hard time keeping itself in physical form. All right. That end your turn, unless you want to move or do anything else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan. You're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, twice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Oh, me? Oh man, I can't do anything against these fuckers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're Scanlan Shorthalt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Believe!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a little. Right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just the tip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Actually, a little bit closer to the guy closest to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You'll get into melee with him if you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Means if you want to do any ranged attack or spell attack roll, you would have disadvantage on it, but otherwise it has no effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can attack you, though, because he's right next to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He won't be for long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I get up close in, like five feet away, and then I'll just Thunderwave him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do that thing where frat boys do the chest bump.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, "Come at me, bro?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. (grunts)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) We did do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's just like 2d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll two d8s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is this the 1st-level Thunderwave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I believe it is, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he rolled a natural four, so it takes 2d8 thunder damage and he is pushed over the table, and then would fall over if it wasn't now drifting above the ground a few inches. Rights itself, but it did push it away from you. Roll 2d8 damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did. It's only nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of thunder damage against that helmed creature. All right, that brings us to their turn. This creature you just slammed into is going to rush back towards you. This one's going to turn and attack you, Grog. Two strikes against you. That is a 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry. 25. Rolled an 18 naturally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that is a 21.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Both hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you take six points of slashing damage, halved to three, and nine points slashing damage, halved to five. So eight points of slashing damage total. Two strikes against you, Scanlan. That is an 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes. That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and then a 12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, that misses!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take-- that's seven plus 11 points of slashing damage. (whoosh) As it goes to strike a second time, you see the second blow coming and just duck out of the way. That ends their go. Next up is Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So there are two guys alive right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One's on Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One's on Grog. The one on Grog is looking a little rough. The one near Scanlan's doing okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How's Cassandra looking next to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's fine. There's no blood. There's nothing; the wound is gone entirely. But other than that, she looks fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looks fine. Okay, I've got my Grasping Vine still up. I'm going to wrap it around the guy that's close to Scanlan and just yank him off of Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This pulls him over Scanlan's form and slams him right next to Cassandra.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and then I will just go, oh! And pop him with my staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can hit things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 does not hit, unfortunately.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw. (ping)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It sounded nice, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of resonated a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shakes off of it for a second. All right, so that ends your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That brings us to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm still down on my knees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still down on your knees. Your brother got up and rushed off, he seems okay, (panting) taking a breath for himself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look up at Percy who is covered in smoke, and I grab his hand and I say, "Percival, how are you?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His head slowly turns towards you, the mask still on. You can see his eyes just barely through the glistening circular glass slots where he looks through. The smoke still billowing up from underneath, the head slowly turns towards you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Darling, take the mask off," and I--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't have a turn yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I shoot at the guy that's attacking Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He is technically in melee with you, so you get disadvantage on these strikes unless you want to move away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he get an attack of opportunity, though, if I scooch back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He would, unless-- he didn't take one against you when you ran back because you disengaged, so yes, he would.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you move back a step. That is a 21.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you take nine points of slashing damage as you reach back. The creature (whoosh) arcs with its sword and manages to strike you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bastard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for your attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that is a 26 and a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't Hunter's Mark him, because I'm brilliant. Yes! 15, 30, 34 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 34 points of damage for both?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, two eights. Plus 14. Plus my bracers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You pull the arrows out and launch them both simultaneously, two arrows in one notch; release them both. One slams into the armor. That one goes underneath the helmet, and as it strikes you hear this horrible echoing (screeching) screech that echoes as the armor (thud) falls to the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take the rest of your movement, if you like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I stand up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you were standing up to move back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I scooched back, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless you wanted to be like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah I wanted to be like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you pulled back while on the ground. Release the arrows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, like up into them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. All right. Stand up, brush yourself off. That ends your go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Trinket isn't allowed to move any at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket can, if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he run after her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Rushes out. Will get there. Rushes through the fog and looks over and sees her right there. Okay. That ends your turn, and now it's her turn. She goes into a full dash and takes off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does Trinket get an attack of opportunity for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket does get attack of opportunity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Trinket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scratch her up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's in the corner. I can't really say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you piece of shit

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (clicks his teeth together)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what did you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it doesn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even with no armor, she's a pretty quick one. She ducks below and bolts down the hallway and around the corner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why did we let her have anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that ends your turn, her turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull off the mask and walk forward a bit, about there, and take three shots at the armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, regular shots?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sharpshooter shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With one ice, so 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 misses. Deflects it with the shield.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deflects the second one with the shield.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heavy armor on this one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dropping sharpshooter for the third one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that it helped. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one actually manages to duck out of the way and splinters across the wall behind it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're tough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to walk as far as I can, so 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I within 40 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I just stand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can use the rest of your action to keep moving, if you'd like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stand right next to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to move to the suit of armor please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Run towards it, jumping and putting one foot on the table; using that as momentum to rush in the air. Go ahead and roll your attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 with fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 16 with fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. (grunts) Bringing the hammer down, the helmet actually gets pushed into the armor and has to reform itself. Before it has a chance to, you bring around the hammer and hit the shield with such force that it pushes it into itself and slams it against the wall. You take the back of the hammer and slam it up under the actual helmet, hitting the creature. You see the flames burn across the side of its arcane form, causing it to shimmer for a second. It's looking pretty rough.
